## Random.item() method

Returns a uniformly selected random item from an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
item<TItem>(items: ReadonlyArray<TItem>): TItem;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  items | ReadonlyArray&lt;TItem&gt; | Array of items to select from. |

**Returns:**

TItem

An item chosed from the given array.
